catalog_script_client.name: Show/hide fields - onLoad

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_254426da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb61
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Technical Services">6044a2da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb74</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show/hide fields - onLoad</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

	g_form.setVisible('internal_user', false);
	g_form.setVisible('contact', false);
	g_form.setVisible('account', false);

	g_form.setMandatory('failure_description', true);
	g_form.setVisible('serial_number', true);


	g_form.setVisible('location', false);
	g_form.setVisible('tools_on_site', false);
	g_form.setVisible('software', false);
	g_form.setVisible('software_version', false);
	g_form.setVisible('prerequisit_version', false);
	g_form.setVisible('filter_resset_date', false);
	g_form.setVisible('filter_activity', false);
	g_form.setVisible('engine_model', false);
	g_form.setVisible('engine_serial_number', false);
	// g_form.setVisible('failure_code', false);
	//g_form.setVisible('failure_description', false);
	g_form.setVisible('safety_related_issue', false);
	g_form.setVisible('failure_rate', false);
	g_form.setVisible('failure_cost', false);
	g_form.setVisible('escalation_level', false);
	g_form.setVisible('d_identification', false);
	g_form.setVisible('d_link_url', false);
	g_form.setVisible('service_information_link', false);
	g_form.setVisible('responsibility_reason_code', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_lidia', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_sculi', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_dpf', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('st_operating_hours', true);

	g_form.setVisible('internal_user', false);
	g_form.setVisible('contact', false);
	g_form.setVisible('account', false);

	if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('snc_internal', true)) {
		if  ((g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice_agent', true)) ||  (g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice.proxy_contact', true)) || (g_user.hasRoleExactly('admin', true))) {
			g_form.setVisible('internal_user', true);
			g_form.setReadOnly('internal_user', true);
			g_form.setVisible('account', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('account', true);
			g_form.setVisible('contact', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('contact', true);
			
			var cur_user = g_form.getValue('internal_user');

			var ga = new GlideAjax('User_Company');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserCompany');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_user', cur_user);
			ga.getXML(getResponse);
			
		} else {
			g_form.setVisible('internal_user', true);
			g_form.setReadOnly('internal_user', true);
		}

	} else if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('snc_external', true)) {
		if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice.customer_admin', true)) {
			g_form.setVisible('contact', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('contact', true);
			g_form.setVisible('internal_user', false);
			g_form.clearValue('internal_user');
			g_form.setVisible('account', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('account', true);
		} else if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice.customer', true)) {
			g_form.setVisible('account', false);
			g_form.setVisible('internal_user', false);
			g_form.clearValue('internal_user');
		}
	}
	
	function getResponse(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		
		var str = JSON.parse(answer);
		
		g_form.setValue('account',str.accountcompanyId,str.companyName);   
		
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cocbom0</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-01 14:04:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>254426da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb61</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show/hide fields - onLoad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_254426da1b6e4d10a4236313604bcb61</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-17 09:19:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
